Package org.birchframework.dto

Interface ErrorCode<E extends Enum<E> & ErrorCode<E>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - requires implementations be Enums that implement this interface
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BirchErrorCode
    public interface ErrorCode<E extends Enum<E> & ErrorCode<E>>
extends Serializable
    Interface to be implemented by all enumerations that define error codes.
    Author:
    Keivan Khalichi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Enum<E> asEnum()
      Convenience method that returns this instance as an Enum object
      default String asString()
      Takes the place of toString, which cannot be used as it has other use cases within the Birch Framework.
      ErrorResponse<E> errorResponse()
      Create an ErrorResponse instance from this error code.
      int getCode()  
      Component getComponent()  
      String getDescription()  
      default String toJSON()
      Marshal's this enumeration into a JSON string.

      • errorResponse

        ErrorResponse<E> errorResponse()
        Create an ErrorResponse instance from this error code.
        Returns:
        error response object populated with data from this error code

        default Enum<E> asEnum()
        Convenience method that returns this instance as an Enum object
        Returns:
        this instance casted as an enum

      • asString

        default String asString()
        Takes the place of toString, which cannot be used as it has other use cases within the Birch Framework.
        Returns:
        string representation of implementations

      • toJSON

        default String toJSON()
        Marshal's this enumeration into a JSON string.
        Returns:
        the JSON string of this object
